title: Clear day, slow city driving with multiple braking events.
caption: A pedestrian crosses the street in front of the ego vehicle.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (glareDay). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.1 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly because it is approaching a crosswalk where a pedestrian is crossing the street. The driver is paying close attention to the traffic lights and surrounding environment to ensure safe navigation through the city.
